name: Ghostly Moans
description:
The kingdom is almost fully healed from a deadly war and humans have been experiencing a peaceful era.

However, reports of spirits possession have been shocking some villagers and they have decided to ask for help in the Holy Temple.

Now, Mia, a young princess who is becoming well-known for her diplomatic way to exorcise these creatures, is the one who will find the ones responsible for the problem.



  • A Classic RPG Experience
  • Day and Night System
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Explore a Fantasy World
  • Side Quests
  • 2 Endings
